name: GitHub Integration Agent
description: AI agent providing GitHub repository, issue, and pull request management capabilities through GitHub's official MCP server. Enables automated code review, issue triage, PR management, and repository analysis.

tools.name: repository_management
tools.description: Browse code, search files, analyze commits across GitHub repositories

tools.name: issue_management
tools.description: Create, update, search, and manage GitHub issues with AI assistance

tools.name: pull_request_management
tools.description: Review PRs, manage approvals, merge conflicts, and code reviews
